mapper.select: select PHOTO_ID as "id", TAKEN_DATE as "date", LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, USER_ID as "personId", SMALLURL, TITLE, VIEWED from FLICKR_EUROPE P where p.REGION_${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and p.TAKEN_DATE >= to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) and p.TAKEN_DATE < to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} order by p.TAKEN_DATE desc limit #{num}
